name: Ragnarok: The Lost Memories
storyline:
There once was a boy who lost his mind while playing a game. When he came back to his senses, he found himself inside the mysterious fantasy world of the game he was just playing!

Suddenly, monsters emerged from the wilderness and began to attack the boy. Just then, a wizard named Rina appeared and launched her own attacks, saving the boy from a dire fate.

Lost in this strange world, the boy gives himself the name "Per" and sets off on an adventure to find his lost memories.

In the world of Midgard, trials and adventures exist around every corner, ready to explore and bring new memories.
Their great adventure begins now!
summary: Ragnarok: The Lost Memories, the follow-up to Ragnarok Online, is finally here! Ragnarok: The Lost Memories brings back all the nostalgia and classic game experience of the original. You can now enjoy the Cinematic Newtro RPG experience on your mobile device! Experience a storyline never before seen in the Ragnarok series. Choose your own path as you unlock the story and truth in Ragnarok: The Lost Memories. It will keep you engaged and wanting to know more about what happens next. Play at your own pace without feeling pressured to keep up. This is an adventure RPG, so expect to face challenges to beat the monsters, clear dungeons, and battle bosses to move forward with your story. A free to play adventure strategy game with a card battle system and character collection system!
